# debugDescription

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the image classifier that’s suitable for output during debugging.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugDescription: String { get }
```

## Describing an image classifier

- **description**: A text representation of the image classifier.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the image classifier shown in a playground.
